title: New: Deaths – Lonewolves
body:
Berlin’s **DEATHS** come out kicking on debut single, _Lonewolves_, showcasing their take on brooding, minimalist electronica, whilst maintaining enough of a pop vibe to suggest that there’s the potential for further crossover.

Closer to the sleek elegance of Purity Ring than the Radio 1 ready pop of CHVRCHES, it’s a unique take on a very current sound. Check out Lonewolves below.
